job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you on the look to create real impact in the world of AI? Exciting developments are happening, offering opportunities for businesses to innovate and gain a competitive edge. Now is the time to join us and leverage those data skills to a next level while working on the most innovative projects for the biggest clients across Europe such as Randstad, ASML, FUNKE, and many more! Whether it's about leveraging LLMs to improve customer support, building data lakes on cloud platforms to improve storage or implementing sensors for quality control. You can find it all at ML6.

   As an AI Engineer, you'll contribute to this by building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure using a dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack.

   Within your team you will:
     * Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
     * Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
     * Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
     * Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
     * Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
     * Work with a wide range of technologies, such as:
       GCP, Azure or/and AWS, Python, Kubernetes, Dataflow / Apache Beam, Terraform, Flask / Connexion, BigQuery, DBT, Kubeflow Pipelines...
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

Are you on the look to create real impact in the world of AI? Exciting developments are happening, offering opportunities for businesses to innovate and gain a competitive edge. Now is the time to join us and leverage those data skills to a next level while working on the most innovative projects for the biggest clients across Europe such as Randstad, ASML, FUNKE, and many more! Whether it's about leveraging LLMs to improve customer support, building data lakes on cloud platforms to improve storage or implementing sensors for quality control. You can find it all at ML6.

   As an AI Engineer, you'll contribute to this by building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure using a dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack.

   Within your team you will:
     * Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
     * Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
     * Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
     * Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
     * Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
     * Work with a wide range of technologies, such as:
       GCP, Azure or/and AWS, Python, Kubernetes, Dataflow / Apache Beam, Terraform, Flask / Connexion, BigQuery, DBT, Kubeflow Pipelines...

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building end-to-end technical solutions, including data pipelines and cloud infrastructure, with a focus on production-ready applications. While it mentions leveraging LLMs, the core responsibilities lean towards broader AI engineering with significant software development and MLOps components, aligning well with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on productionizing AI solutions.

phrases: Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions, which is the core of business understanding in a technical role.

phrases: building scalable data pipelines
Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: These phrases explicitly mention building and deploying data pipelines and designing data architecture, which are key components of data engineering.

phrases: leveraging LLMs to improve customer support
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'leveraging LLMs' indicates involvement in using or adapting generative models for specific applications.

phrases: building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure
end-to-end technical solutions
Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
Flask / Connexion
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on building 'production ready applications' and 'end-to-end technical solutions', along with specific web framework mentions, points to significant software development responsibilities.

phrases: building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure
cloud infrastructure
Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
Kubernetes
Dataflow / Apache Beam
Terraform
Kubeflow Pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The description includes building and deploying pipelines and applications on cloud platforms, along with specific MLOps and infrastructure tools like Kubernetes, Terraform, and Dataflow, indicating a strong focus on operations and deployment.

phrases: effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions
create real impact in the world of AI
innovative projects
dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack
